Hallo, 
 We are two students of engineering faculty in Rome, and we are 
developing some studies about experimental researches of 
Deutschmann: exactly we are trying to obtain the same data in 
workshop_introduction.pdf file about methane oxidation. We try that 
by the "rundiamond.cpp"( we've found it in "test_problems" in 
cantera's web page), modified for our specific problems( we've cut 
all concerning reaction rates cause we are interested only in 
coverages) and by "ptcombust.cti" as input file.  
We have some questions: 
1)in order to obtain surface coverages variation data our temporal 
step is too small (1.0e-15!!!).How is it possible? 
2)Which kind of "reactor" can we use (and its relative inlet 
parameters-temperature, coverages, gas molar fraction-)? 
 
thank you 
 
                      Simone & Matteo
